title: It’s All Crappening with 'Watch What Crappens' Ronnie Karam and Ben Mandelker
itunes:title: It’s All Crappening
description:
Jackie and Ronnie Karam and Ben Mandelker from “Watch What Crappens” go down the rabbit hole that will satiate even the thirstiest Bravo-holics. 

Hubble Contacts is a proud sponsor of this episode and is offering listeners 15-pairs of free contact lenses. Go to Hubblecontacts.com and select BITCHBIBLE at checkout to redeem offer.

The co-founder of Thuma, and ex-boyfriend of Jackie, is a proud sponsor of this episode of the Bitch Bible and is offering listeners $100 off their beautiful new bed frame. Go to www.Thuma.co and use the code BitchBible to redeem your offer.
